text:
The bug is regression from Jmeter 2.0.3

In the version of 2.0.3, the jmeter client can run testings on jmeter server, 
and the jmeter client can call remote jmeter servers to runs the script, and 
everythings works well.

due to 2.1.x and 2.2.x, now the non-gui model jmeter client cannot runs the 
testing scripts well.

it now can start the testing, and running the script, but when executing "end-
of-run", the jmeter client hung.
creator: mingyang.ding@gmail.com

text:
I have the same situation!
When this prb will be resolved?

I have the same situation, I'm using BeanShell Samplers. When this issue will be
resolved? Pls send me the answer as soon as possible!
creator: vetalok@gmail.com

text:
I don't know when the problem will be resolved.

In the meantime, a work-round is to use non-GUI mode, which is less resource 
intensive anyway.
creator: sebb@apache.org

text: Seems to be fixed in current SVN code
creator: sebb@apache.org
